Tafawa Balewa Square Bus Terminus nke eji kwara aha  TBS Bus Terminal mara bụ nke dị n'etiti Lagos Island, Lagos State, South West, Nigeria
Ebe bọs na-akwụsị dị na 45/57 Massey Bamgbose Street, Lagos Island.TBS Bus Terminal dị na Tafawa Balewa Square nke a rụrụ na 1972 iji mee emume nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa na 1 Ọktoba 1960

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2016, gọọmentị Akinwumi Ambode, onye bụbu gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti kwubiri atụmatụ iji mee ka ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ dịghachi ndụ iji "kwalite ọrụ nnukwu obodo nke steeti ahụ". E nyere ọdụ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ ahụ ọrụ na 2017.
